experiments.experiment_description: Our aim is to find best tui, cui and entity similarity matrices based on given thresholds in this experiment. Each threshold values step up 0.5 in every single model training. Every created model uses one similarity matrix as an input of model. DDIMDL dataset is used as a dataset.

experiment_tags.project_name: DDIMDL with similarity matrices of tuis, cuis and entities
experiment_tags.mlflow.note.content: Our aim is to find best tui, cui and entity similarity matrices based on given thresholds in this experiment. Each threshold values step up 0.5 in every single model training. Every created model uses one similarity matrix as an input of model. DDIMDL dataset is used as a dataset
